[[inst_sd_umax]]
==== SD.UMAX

*Syntax:* sd.umax<.{rl, f, rlf}> [SrcL], SrcR

*Description:* Atomic Unsigned Max operation: memory value is atomically unsigned maxed with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sd_umax.svg[SD.UMAX encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
